post:
Hello everyone. Today is my birthday! Due to this I thought I would do something special.

For the rest of the day, we will be offering a 50% off discount the 1st month on all services. This excludes domains, licenses, and addons.

To take advantage of this, use coupon OCTBIRTHDAY.

And as a reminder our website is [simplydigitalhosting.com](http://www.simplydigitalhosting.com)

Have a happy Halloween tomorrow!
